rows.label: bf05140100_0010
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, making you wash
up like this.

rows.label: bf05140100_0020
rows.name: No no, don't worry about it!

rows.label: bf05140100_0030
rows.name: I like both cooking and cleaning up after.

rows.label: bf05140100_0040
rows.name: You're a dear. I never expeced this from Rex.

rows.label: bf05140100_0050
rows.name: He really did bring a good wife back home.

rows.label: bf05140100_0060
rows.name:
Huh? No no no, it's not like that!
I'm just Rex's Blade!

rows.label: bf05140100_0080
rows.name:
You do hear of Blades and Drivers getting
married a lot in the old stories!

rows.label: bf05140100_0100
rows.name:
This is a lovely village.
Everyone's so warm and carefree.

rows.label: bf05140100_0110
rows.name: It's removed from everything, you see.

rows.label: bf05140100_0120
rows.name:
I think if everyone could live like this...
The world might be a happier place.

rows.label: bf05140100_0130
rows.name: You know, between you and me...

rows.label: bf05140100_0140
rows.name:
I think, deep down,
Rex still misses his mother a little.

rows.label: bf05140100_0150
rows.name: In a way, you remind me of her. Just a tad.

rows.label: bf05140100_0170
rows.name: Actually... He took me to say hello to his parents.

rows.label: bf05140100_0190
rows.name: You know, Rex wasn't born here in Iyasaki.
